@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The audio widget embeds an audio file, which can be automatically played by incoming data

<audio id="audio_widget" src="path/to/audio_file.mp3">
  <layout colspan="4"/>
  <label>Audio</label>
  <address transform="DPT:1.001" mode="read">0/0/0</address>
</audio>
Markus Damman
0.8.4 (2014)

@widgetexample.name: @widgetexample
@widgetexample.body:
<settings>
   <screenshot name="audio_example">
    <caption>Default example for defining an audio widget in the configuration</caption>
    <data address="0/0/0">1</data>
   </screenshot>
 </settings>
 <audio id="audio_widget" src="path/to/audio_file.mp3">
   <layout colspan="4" />
   <label>Audio</label>
   <address transform="DPT:1.001" mode="read">0/0/0</address>
 </audio>

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {var} the incoming value after transformation, mapping and formatting

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Format to apply to incoming values

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Map of addresses (KNX-GA's or openHAB item names) this widget communicates with

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles updates of incoming data for this widget

@param.name: @param
@param.body: address {String} Source address of the incoming data
@param.description: Source address of the incoming data

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} Incoming data

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Process the incoming data, update the shown value and the stylings

@param.name: @param
@param.body: address {String} Address of the incoming value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {String} the incoming value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Description

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ev {var}

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {var}

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Decode the given data with the addresses transform

@param.name: @param
@param.body: address {String} KNX-GA or openHAB-item name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {var} value to be decoded

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Apply the given mapping to the value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} value to be mapped

@param.name: @param
@param.body: mappingName {String?} mapping name, if not set the mapping property value is used
@param.description: mapping name, if not set the mapping property value is used

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Look up the entry for value in the mapping this_map and return the next value in the list (including wrap around).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} value to look up

@param.name: @param
@param.body: this_map {String} mapping name

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Format the given value according to the defined format. If no format is defined the value will not be changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: address {String} KNX-GA or openHAB item name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} value to be formatted

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The default value handling for most of the widgets. This method applies the transform, mapping, format and styling to the value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {string} address - KNX-GA or openHAB item name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {*} data - value to be processes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Method to handle all special cases for the value. The might come from the mapping where it can be quite complex as it can contain icons.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {(*|*[])} value - the value, or an array of values, that will be inserted
@param.description: - the value, or an array of values, that will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {HTMLElement} targetElement - the element where value will be added to
@param.description: - the element where value will be added to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {Function?} modifyFn - callback function that modifies the DOM
@param.description: - callback function that modifies the DOM

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Default update function, processes the incoming value and applies it to the DOM value element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {string} ga - KNX-GA or openHAB item name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {*} data - the raw value from the bus
@param.description: - the raw value from the bus

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {HTMLElement?} passedElement - the element to update, if not given {@link getDomElement()} is used
@param.description: - the element to update, if not given {@link getDomElement()} is used

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Internal function which updates the DOM element with the given value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {HTMLElement} targetElement - element to update

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {*} value - value to add to the element
@param.description: - value to add to the element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property address. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #address}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property address. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #address}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property address. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #address}.
